title: Unable to login
description: Customer cannot log in with registered email address.

title: Payment not processed
description: Customer’s credit card payment keeps failing.

title: Slow mobile app
description: App is freezing frequently on Android devices.

title: Password reset email missing
description: Customer did not receive the reset email.

title: Double charge
description: Customer was charged twice for the same transaction.

title: Feature request: Live chat
description: Customer suggests adding live chat support.

title: App crashes on checkout
description: App crashes when placing an order.

title: Refund not received
description: Customer’s refund has not been processed after 7 days.

title: Order delayed
description: Customer’s package is still in transit beyond expected delivery date.

title: Incorrect order received
description: Customer received the wrong product in the order.

title: Website not loading
description: Website shows server error on homepage.

title: Request for billing statement
description: Customer needs a copy of last month’s bill.

title: Coupon not working
description: Customer reports that discount code is invalid.

title: Shipping address issue
description: Customer cannot update shipping address after placing order.

title: Feedback on new design
description: Customer provides feedback about website UI changes.
